subject: French Open (Tennis)
UEFA European Football Championship
Stanley Cup
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: A hat trick for Messi. Game 7 in the N.B.A. A split decision in the Bradley-Pacquiao fight. And a six-pitcher no-hitter. Those are three days worth replaying.
snippet: A hat trick for Messi. Game 7 in the N.B.A. A split decision in the Bradley-Pacquiao fight. And a six-pitcher no-hitter. Those are three days worth replaying.
